content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Every person is unique, and so is their smile. A smile serves as an invitation to our fellow human beings to get to know us.

Not everyone is naturally blessed with beautiful, even, white teeth. Do you  smile or laugh with your hand covering your mouth or with your lips closed? This can be a thing of the past now. Smile and laugh spontaneously, joyously, confidently, and in a relaxed way.

We live in a beauty conscious society. No wonder, the smile on the face adds to one’s charms & beauty but it has a more important role of improving one’s self image. It is rightly said that smile is a curve that sets everything straight.

SMILE DESIGNING: 

It  is a process whereby complete oral hard and soft tissues are studied and certain changes are brought about which will have a positive influence on overall esthetics of face. One of the greatest assets a person can have is a smile that shows beautiful natural teeth.

Smile designing procedures are essential for smiles that are defective, unappealing or ugly. The defects may lie in the color or shape of the teeth. Defects or excessive visibility of the supporting gums can also contribute to ugly smiles.

Cosmetic Consultation:
Your initial consultation consists of a very comprehensive exam that includes everything from looking at your teeth and gums, to your bite and the way your whole mouth looks and functions as a whole.

 

Computer Imaging:
We will take a simple digital photograph of your face, download this into the computer, and then use a cosmetic dentistry computer imaging program to place the smile design of your choice with your face. We employ latest technology  that allows us to design your new smile with the help of computer video-imaging,                                               which will show how you will look with your new teeth.

Treatment Plan:

Our cosmetic dentist will analize your smile and discuss your goals and expectations of your new smile.

 

 

What do you want your smile to look like?

What you don’t like about your smile that you want to get changed?

The Dentist will discuss with you all the possible options, & will show you examples of people who have changed their lives by changing their smile. Together, we will determine the “style” of your new smile.

Our aim will always be to deliver pain-free dentistry in a comfortable, warm and friendly environment and to build a trust with our clients that lasts a lifetime.

 

 

 

Kind of restorative procedures available to modern clinicians, when used in combination with proper treatment planning, enable the  Dentist to provide enhanced aesthetic care that achieves the increasing expectations of their patients.

 

 

 

 

 

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][stm_sidebar sidebar=”812″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
